title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple API for chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface), model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, model pull/list/delete.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor, generate code, or refactor selections.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles for niche models (CodeLlama-70B-Python, SQLCoder, etc.).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands or thread chats.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama endpoints with async views, admin panel, and REST serializer.
